proof (prove)
using this:
  [] \<preceq> l \<equiv> \<exists>l3. [] @ l3 = l

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [] \<preceq> l
(* the empty list is in any non-empty prefix-closed set *)
lemma empty_trace_contained: "\<lbrakk> prefixclosed tr ; tr \<noteq> {} \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prefixclosed tr; tr \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prefixclosed tr; tr \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr

proof (state)
this:
  prefixclosed tr
  tr \<noteq> {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prefixclosed tr; tr \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  prefixclosed tr
  tr \<noteq> {}

proof (prove)
using this:
  prefixclosed tr
  tr \<noteq> {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>l1. l1 \<in> tr \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  l1 \<in> tr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prefixclosed tr; tr \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr

proof (chain)
picking this:
  prefixclosed tr
  l1 \<in> tr

proof (prove)
using this:
  prefixclosed tr
  l1 \<in> tr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>l2. l2 \<preceq> l1 \<longrightarrow> l2 \<in> tr

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>l2. l2 \<preceq> l1 \<longrightarrow> l2 \<in> tr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>prefixclosed tr; tr \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [] \<in> tr

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>l2. l2 \<preceq> l1 \<longrightarrow> l2 \<in> tr

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [] \<in> tr

proof (state)
this:
  [] \<in> tr

goal:
No subgoals!
lemma transitive_prefix: "\<lbrakk> l1 \<preceq> l2 ; l2 \<preceq> l3 \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> l1 \<preceq> l3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>l1 \<preceq> l2; l2 \<preceq> l3\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> l1 \<preceq> l3
